SmartSunglasses: A pair of sunglasses with built-in AI technology that can detect and protect your eyes from harmful blue light emitted from digital devices. These sunglasses can also enhance your visual experience by providing augmented reality features such as virtual try-on, and virtual filters for different environments.

Eco-Friendly Sunglasses: A pair of sunglasses made from sustainable materials such as recycled plastic, bamboo, or plant-based materials. These sunglasses not only reduce waste but also provide UV protection and durability.

Personalized Sunglasses: A platform that allows users to design and create their own custom sunglasses. Users can choose from various frame styles, lens colors, and designs, and even add personalized details such as their initials or favorite quotes.

SmartSunglasses for the Visually Impaired: A pair of sunglasses with advanced technology that can assist visually impaired individuals in navigating their surroundings. These sunglasses can detect obstacles and provide audio or tactile feedback to help the wearer avoid collisions.

Sunglasses with Built-in Music Player: A pair of sunglasses with a built-in music player that allows users to listen to music without the need for a separate device. The sunglasses can store a variety of music tracks and even include voice control for hands-free control.
